TEXT.TITLE: VICTORIA STATE BODY ISSUES CANADIAN DLR EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Victorian Public Authorities Finance Agency is issuing a 100 mln Canadian dlr bond due April 15, 1992 paying 8-1/2 pct and priced at 100-5/8 pct, lead manager Wood Gundy Ltd said. The non-callable bond is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 Canadaian dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. It is guaranteed by the State of Victoria. The selling concession is 1-1/4 pct while management and pays 1/4 pct and underwriting 3/8 pct. The payment date is April 15. REUTER
